page.title: 05HEALTH
page.content:
In Braunstone there is a Health Centre in the Civic Centre, and a doctor's surgery. A Health Visitor checks on the health of local children until they are five years old. Then the School nurses take over. When children are 4 and a half years old, they receive an injection called a pre_school booster. At 10 they have a rubella injection. These people can also offer medical help if needed _
{ { doctor} _____ {health { dentist }_____ {teeth} { chiropodist}__ {feet { optician}_____ {eyes {speech therapist speech {audiologist}__ { eyes and ears There is also a psychiatric nurse.
